item.description:
Hi everyone,

We'll meet at the Mintueman National Park at 10am. There are several different entrances but we will meet at the main visitor parking lot.

On April 19, 1775, the American Revolution began at Lexington and Concord with a clash of arms known to history as "the shot heard round the world." At Minute Man National Historical Park the opening battle of the Revolution is brought to life as visitors explore the battlefields and witness the American revolutionary spirit through the writings of the Concord authors.

Minute Man National Historical Park is home to many unique and interesting historic structures, interpretive walking trails and cultural landscapes.

From I-95: Take exit 30B. You will be on Route 2A west. The park is 1-mile west off ramp.
item.name: Mintueman National Park - Lincoln
